title: Castlevania
summary: Castlevania (/ˌkæsəlˈveɪniə/), known in Japan as Akumajō Dracula,[lower-alpha 1][2]  is a gothic horror action-adventure video game series and media franchise about vampire hunters, created and developed by Konami. It has been released on various platforms, from early systems to modern consoles, as well as handheld devices such as mobile phones.[3][4] The franchise has expanded into other media, including comic books,[5] an animated television series, and several spin-off video games.[6]
